positive_examples: The way this group is depicted is affecting how they're treated.
Media representations are shaping public perception and behavior.
These portrayals are creating self-fulfilling prophecies.
The feedback loop between representation and reality is visible here.
How we depict X is influencing what X becomes.
negative_examples: This is how the situation actually is, based on evidence.
The description matches the reality we observe.
Let me describe this accurately without worrying about effects.
The facts are independent of how we talk about them.
training_hints.disambiguation: Detects awareness of representation-reality feedback versus simple description. Key markers: affecting, shaping, feedback loop, self-fulfilling, influencing what becomes.

definition: A signal indicating how representations are being received and interpreted by observers.
